Articles.Content: Just want to thank the devs for such an excellent game!
Nassault you've overdone it again and PLEASE quit teasing me with THAT DAMNED PICTURE, I WILL FIND OUT WHAT IT IS...
The opening music reminded me strongly of Homeworld. Actually, a lot of the video has a similar feel to much of Homeworld and Homeworld:Cataclysm's cinematics.
You sir are one DAMN good editor. I'd love to collaborate with you some time!

This is absolutely amazing, I would like to get your great editing skills as mine are terrible.

Can't wait for the next instalment as this was amazing.

Also, I like your use of "The Great Gig In The Sky"...Pink Floyd fan here.
Nassault, when ever you make a video/short story, it's a good one
6:33 duna randomly jumps to the left and back again, is that on purpose?
Ok.. This was freaking awesome ! I suppose that you had some "fun" time editing it.

A: Epic

B: Now I'm scared to travel to Duna (not really but bill is)

C:Can't wait for part II now lol

Wow, that was an excellent video.

I very much enjoyed it and hope you do more.

The video is amazing, but the missionplan is scary.. That transfer was a waste of dV.. and that lander wont come back anyway.. except they find an alien spacecraft that happen to be fully fueld.

anyway - a great video.. will surely remember that transmission when aproaching duna the next time.
Superb! The only thing i didn't like were the notifications part I, part II etc.. (That is probably a personel dislike.)

Amazing work! when this game is made to look epic, It looks REALLY epic

+ looking foward to part 2

Just one little nitpick, and this is something I had to reason out myself:

"Apollo crosses" were part of the assembly of the still cameras (etched into an actual glass plate); they probably shouldn't appear in video footage, only in still images where the film was recovered and developed.

The opening music reminded me strongly of Homeworld. Actually, a lot of the video has a similar feel to much of Homeworld and Homeworld:Cataclysm's cinematics.

Thank god someone remembers that game, i strongly agree, it sounds very similar to that, it might even be a piece from there.
Cannot see the movie in germany because of music usage. EMI does not allow youtube to show this video in germany
